amendatorysection.catchline: Repealed. Laws 2018, LB377, § 87. Operative date January 1, 2019. Class I school district; merger with certain Class I school districts; petition.
amendatorysection.para: When the legal voters of a Class I school district petition to merge with a Class I district with a six-member school board, such merger may be accepted by petition of the school board of the accepting district.
